MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA13 area of Kilmacolm, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:37pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite. And our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:16 PM on Monday, 15 March 2021.
